hadiths.text: Narrated Ghailan:Anas said "You people do (bad) deeds (commit sins) which seem in your eyes as tiny (minute) than hair while we used to consider those (very deeds) during the life-time of the Prophet (ﷺ) as destructive sins

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُتَّقَى مِنْ مُحَقَّرَاتِ الذُّنُوبِ
chapter.eng-name: What minor sins should be warded off
